comment:
>>44314739

With a battle shout, you charge forward and take a leaping, two-handed vertical swing.

> [[ 23 ]]

It blocks the strike again, weapon cracking loudly, and you land on your feet, stumbling backwards a couple of steps.

Okay, that one was practice too.

>>44314740

> [[ 49 ]]

With a flourish and horizontal spin, you step forward and swing at an angle, blowing the damaged staff apart and decapitating the dummy. All of the pieces fall unceremoniously onto the floor.

> [[ Ascheritte defeated test dummy (no EXP awarded) ]]

The blue field fades from your body. A Custodian sweeps down from a compartment on the ceiling and begins collecting the broken parts, brushing against you on the way.

> [[ HP: 35 / 35 ]]

Well, it works! The barricades and door open, and you make your way back up to the top.

“Good attack, milord! That's a fancy bastard sword you've got.” One of the guards says, planting the end of her spear against the ground to afford you a salute with her free hand. “Done for today?”

[[ 1 ]]
> Negotiate an even rate with the guards. It won't cost more than a few credits per opponent, and everyone could use a little stress relief.
> Negotiate for a slightly profitable rate with the guards. The extra can go to sprucing the place up.
> Negotiate for one hundred percent profit. This place is for -important people- to use. How else are you going to have a zweihander the size of a station wagon?

[[ 2 ]]
> Check out the Celestial Altar.
> Head to the overworld simulation.
name: Sylvetica
